name: SkyHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the chandelier”
”Alexa, set chandelier to fifty percent”
”Alexa, set all the lights to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is used to control your smart home using SkyPlug™ and SkyPlatform™ by using voice commands on Alexa.

You can use this skill to control all of your SkyPlug™ and SkyPlatform™ lighting fixtures in your location.

* In order to work with the Skill, you will first need to have a valid phone number that is associated with a SkyHome account
